citations.title: Towards AI-Based Precision Oncology: A Machine Learning Framework for Personalized Counterfactual Treatment Suggestions based on Multi-Omics Data

Structure-based drug discovery with deep learning
Social and environmental impact of recent developments in machine learning on biology and chemistry research
Opportunities in deep learning methods development for computational biology
Computational model discovery with reinforcement learning
Building Flexible, Scalable, and Machine Learning-ready Multimodal Oncology Datasets
Circuit design in biology and machine learning. I. Random networks and dimensional reduction
